Title: Password Generator
HomeWiki:
C# .net 4.0 Password generation application

Latest version 3.3 :
  • Complete refactoring of core library and wpf user interface
  • Less CPU intensive
  • Added :
    • Capacity to choose a minimum password strength.
    • Save generated passwords to a text file. (Right-click in result grid)
    • Password evaluation

Strength algorithm taken from Microsoft Online Safety. See here : https://www.microsoft.com/protect/fraud/passwords/checker.aspx

Fully customisable password creation.
Choose to use numbers, upper case or lower case letters and even symbols.

Allow the use of custom dictionary
Create a simple text file containing the set of characters to use on one line
